name: surpassingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely: The scenery around Frog Lake is surpassingly beautiful. It is surpassingly difficult to think of a reason why we should forgive him.
More examplesFewer examplesThe audience sang the hymns surpassingly well.The city's antiquities and ruins are surpassingly beautiful."Grey Gardens" is a surpassingly strange musical that opened on Saturday at the Centre for the Performing Arts.One thing we are surpassingly good at depicting - in art, literature and life - is poverty.Reviewers described the film as "surpassingly beautiful".
